text: @Forbes_Duncan @brianjohnson141 That’s fantastic news, but why are #Wales lumped in as a #UK entity when it comes to overseas #travel #holidays ?Same for #Scotland. They’re both clearly managing #COVID19 a lot better. Grateful for any answers. #thanks @WelshGovernment @LeanneWood @NicolaSturgeon @ScotGovFM
